text: Hey everyone! I'm pretty new to HubSpot and was messing around with the social-follow module, but unfortunately, I came into an issue I can't figure out: how can I change the color of the icons by adding to the boilerplate? I modified the fields.json to include a color for each icon and can access it, but I don't know how to change the icon color for each icon.
